name: MongoDB Enterprise V-81921
title: MongoDB must maintain the confidentiality and integrity of information during preparation for transmission.
script:
mode="net.ssl.mode"
checkfile="/etc/mongod.conf"
if [ -f $checkfile ]
then
    log=$(grep -i "${mode}" "${checkfile}" | grep -Ev '#' | grep -i "requireSSL")
    if [ -z "$log" ]
    then
       echo "Can't find $mode within $checkfile"
       exit 1
    else
       echo "$mode exist within $checkfile"
       exit 0
    fi
    else
       echo "$checkfile does not exist"
       exit 1
    fi
